description: IT Generalist passionate about delivering efficient, reliable, and secure solutions for complex and diverse network and system environments. I have a strong background in IT infrastructure, ITIL, AWS, G-Suite administration, and I am proficient in help desk, network, and system support. As an IT support lead at vConstruct, I collaborate with a talented team of engineers and technicians to provide high-quality service and support for internal and external clients across various industries and domains with primary being construction technologies.
detailOrQuote: I am passionate about solving problems in new creative ways to foster IT support experience to end users. By leveraging my IT Generalist experience I continually look for new and better ways to make enterprise focus more on their core work and handle their anxiety to IT team.
